full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 52 of 236 956 LC3KMAX2 Alessi - Cross Virginia Roberts' lawyer, Brad Edwards. Do you recall that? A. I don't recall him, but it was one of the lawyers, he asked me questions. Q. And you were in Fort Lauderdale at an office when you were answering these questions? A. Yes, sir. Q. Okay. And Mr. Edwards then says to you at line 22 -- THE COURT: And I will caution -- MR. PAGLIUCA: Right. Q. -- "If Jane believes that the year was 1994 or 1995" -- and then you say, no. Do you see that? A. Again, I think in this testimony, I mistake the two, I confused the two girls. Q. I understand that's what you're saying today, Mr. Alessi -- A. Yes. Q. -- but in 2016, when you testified, you were specifically directed to the name Jane and what Jane, according to this lawyer, believed, and you answered no. Do you see that? A. Could have been. Q. Okay. And then the question from Mr. Edwards is: You don't SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012566
